DOCU_Docu.DOC:
These actions manipulate variables in a java .properties file.
=Rollback=
The actions manipulating Java .properties files support rollback.
* Actions getting some information do not need rollback. Such a method is RETRIEVE_PROPERTY.
* Rollbacks for actions changing potentially the content of a file are implemented using the 'File based' Backup/Rollback mechanism built into the Automation Engine.
